sentences.sContent: If you wait three or four years, how old will you be when your hypothetical future kids graduate from high school or university?
sentences.sContent_eng: If you wait three or four years, how old will you be when your hypothetical future kids graduate from high school or university?
sentences.sCn: 如果你在等个三四年的话，那你假象中的孩子高中毕业或者大学毕业的时候你自己都多少岁了呢？
